role.descr: thing looked at or for or on

example.name: autogen1
example.text: traders should be on the lookout for how metals producers react to this rally
example.arg: for how metals producers react to this rally

example.name: autogen2
example.text: The department is advising residents to plant Sagos , if they must , in the back yard and telling nurseries to be on the lookout for anyone trying to palm one off .
example.arg: for anyone trying to palm one off
